features: ANTI-COLIC BABY BOTTLE. Anti-Colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Decreases spit-up, burping and gas.
CONSISTENT FLOW RATE. Vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so babies can feed at their own pace.
PRESERVES NUTRIENTS. The anti-colic vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep.
BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again.

BOTTLE GROWS WITH BABY. Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ baby bottle works best with the internal vent system in place but can be removed as baby’s feeding develops – no need to introduce a different bottle.
SUSTAINABLE BABY BOTTLE. Dr. Brown’s Narrow bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable.

PLASTIC BANK COLLABORATION. Dr. Brown’s has collaborated with Plastic Bank to prevent ocean plastic and reduce their plastic footprint. Purchasing Dr. Brown’s baby bottles help toward their commitment to prevent 31 million plastic bottles from entering the ocean annually. Learn more at PlasticBank.com.
DISHWASHER SAFE. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free.
Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ Narrow Baby Bottle, Squirrel & Goat, 8 oz/250 mL, with Level 1 Slow Flow Nipple, BPA free, 0m+, 2-Pack
body.description: Your options have never been better with Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ Narrow Baby Bottle. The anti-colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Dr. Brown’s bottles provide a more comfortable feeding experience for baby by decreasing spit-up, burping and gas. This vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so baby can feed at their own pace. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again. Dr. Brown’s vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep. The silicone nipple, together with the internal vent system, offer a reliable and trusted bottle feeding experience that makes Dr. Brown’s the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Baby Bottle in the U.S.* Made to grow with baby, our bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free. *IQVIA Health ProVoice Survey 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Soothing Solution for Peaceful Feeds
reviews.reviewText: As a parent, finding the right bottle for your newborn can feel like a quest for the holy grail, especially when dealing with the dreaded colic that disrupts many babies' early days. My journey led me to Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ Narrow Baby Bottle, a choice that has proven to be a blessing for both my baby and me.What sets these bottles apart is their innovative green anti-colic filter, designed to minimize the air intake during feeding, a common culprit behind colic symptoms. This thoughtful feature has been a game-changer, ensuring that feeding times are comfortable and calm, devoid of the fussiness and discomfort that can accompany swallowed air. The result? Peaceful, uninterrupted feeds and a content baby, which is all a parent could ask for.My experience with Dr. Brown's bottles has been overwhelmingly positive from day one. The assurance that comes from knowing my child is less likely to suffer from colic symptoms is invaluable. The design of these bottles deserves special mention too; they're not just functional but also come with the most adorable squirrel and goat designs that add a touch of whimsy to our feeding routine.The bottles' 8 oz capacity is another feature I appreciate. It's perfect for adapting to my baby's growing appetite, eliminating the need to switch to larger bottles as he gets older. This versatility, combined with the slow flow nipple suited for newborns, makes these bottles a practical choice for long-term use.Ease of cleaning and assembly is crucial for any baby bottle, and Dr. Brown's doesn't disappoint. The anti-colic filter, while an additional part to clean, is a small trade-off for the benefits it provides. The bottles are also BPA free, addressing any concerns about harmful chemicals.In summary, Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ Bottles have been a cornerstone of our feeding routine, providing not just a solution to potential colic but also a delightful design and practical features that cater to a growing baby's needs. If you're navigating the vast world of baby bottles, consider giving these a try for a blend of function and fun that will make feeding time something to look forward to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps to Keep Gas Away
reviews.reviewText: I have used Dr. Brown's bottles for all of my kids, and they don't disappoint. With the birth of my newest baby, I needed to replace the bottles I had since I had gotten rid of them all years prior. The bottles have changed design a bit over the years, but they do an excellent job at helping to keep the amount of air their take in to a minimum, which in turn helps to make for less gassy and happier babies. The internal parts are a little bit of a pain to keep clean, but the bottles can function with and without them. As my baby's get older, I eventually stop using the internal parts and just use them as a regular bottle. But when my kids are younger and colic is a lot more of a problem, those parts make a world of difference and are worth the extra time it takes to clean them. I'm not planning on any more kids after this one, but if I did, I would buy this again in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same as standard Dr. Browns
reviews.reviewText: I was intrigued to know what the difference was between these which are the options+ vs the standard dr. Browns bottles. I’m here to report that nothing seems to have changed except these have a different animal design on the side which is cool and all. We’re on our second kid who is about 4 months and have used dr. Browns bottles for him and our older daughter and they are the best. A bit of a pain to clean with the stem and valve but they work and if it ain’t broke don’t fix it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great baby bottles!
reviews.reviewText: Such great quality baby bottles! Love the little animal designs on these. These also come with the anti colic part. The squirrel and goat are a nice little upgraded touch. Everything else is like a regular bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More suitable for older infants
reviews.reviewText: We used Dr. Brown's bottles for my son since he was a newborn. The bottles are notorious for being harder to clean because of the anti-colic "straws", but you have the option to not use these. We only started using the larger 8 oz size for feedings when my LO was an older infant and drinking larger amounts. These would be hilariously large for a newborn. You can always choose to use these for storing expressed breastmilk as well. Nonetheless, a classic staple for our family and these bottles have cute gender neutral designs. For the price, I do wish it also came with the travel caps to prevent leaks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles came highly recommended by multiple people, including a pediatrician. We are happy to report that we have a less "gassy" baby after using these bottles. The baby latched easily to the natural-like nipple. The flow is excellent. The only "negative" I can give the bottles is my own uncertainty that I am getting the bottles completely sterilized. The straw/filter used to reduce air intake needs some additional attention. I have since ordered Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Reusable Baby Bottle Vent System and Reservoir Cleaning Bristle Brushes. These brushes help me feel more confident that my bottles are truly clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Good, sturdy bottles.All parts do separate for easy cleaning.Minimal burps are produced, though one does still need to the burp baby after a feeding.Nipple was a good size and comfortable for baby, and flow of liquid was also as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are simple enough-love them
reviews.reviewText: These are one of the 2 brands I like for baby bottles. Despite the anti colic feature it is still easy to clean which is so important to most parents..anything that makes the job easier is worth trying so I’d say this doesn’t necessarily make it easier but also doesn’t make it any harder plus you have the added anti colic feature. Love the neutral colored design too and the bottles are the perfect size.
